title: With Burning Patience
creator_credit: Antonio Skarmeta, Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen, Prole Film and Von Vietinghoff Filmproduktion (VVF)
brief_description: A film of impassioned charm tracing the lives of little people caught up in large events. A haunting poetic drama which blends Chilean history at the time of the downfall of the Allende government in 1973, with a delicate village love story.
